summary: This is an email chain from November 8, 2019, discussing the timing of rolling out at least two prosecution memos related to the Epstein case. The correspondence indicates internal coordination about the memos, with one possibly concerning Maxwell/M and another concerning an LLC.

events.title: Team discussion on Epstein memos
events.description: The sender spoke with their team about an update on the timing of prosecution memos related to Epstein.

events.title: Email coordination on memo rollout
events.description: Internal email correspondence discussing the planned rollout of at least two different prosecution memos over the coming weeks.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated November 8, 2019, discussing internal coordination on the Epstein case.
It references the planned rollout of at least two different prosecution memos over the next few weeks.
One memo may concern 'Maxwell/M' and another may concern an 'LLC', indicating separate legal or investigative tracks.
The correspondence shows active planning and communication within a team handling aspects of the Epstein prosecution.
